meta_description.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild for Nintendo Switch
meta_description.text: Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking new game in the acclaimed series.Genre: Adventure, Action, Role-Playing, OtherRelease date: March 03, 2017Players: 1 player

meta_description.title: The Legend of Zelda - Zelda Wiki
meta_description.text: The Legend of Zelda is the first installment of the Zelda series. meta_description.title: The Legend of Zelda (Series)
meta_description.text: The Legend of Zelda is a video game series that takes place in the fictional medieval-inspired Kingdom of Hyrule, often led by the titular Princess Zelda.

meta_description.text: The Legend of Zelda (or The Hyrule Fantasy: Legend of Zelda in Japan) is the first game in The Legend of Zelda video game series. nintendo, koei tecmo, spike chunsoft, st.giga, nintendo of america inc.

knowledge_panel.description: the legend of zelda is a high fantasy action-adventure video game franchise created by japanese game designers shigeru miyamoto and takashi tezuka. it is primarily developed and published by nintendo, although some portable installments and re-releases have been outsourced to capcom, vanpool, and grezzo. wikipedia
